alert.note: Alert for Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:15AM CST until February 18 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pigeon River at Newport TN. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway 25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 9.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EST /715 PM CST/.
